page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER IN DATCHWORTH
page.content: Datchworth has a{Rural Policeman}as there is no police station. The nearest is the Divisional Police Station in Stevenage. There has been a resident police constable in Datchworth since the last century.The present constable lives opposite the Village Hall. He is classified as a rural village constable. His jurisdiction covers Datchworth, Bulls Green and Burnham Green. His job mainly involves helping and advising the general public. There has been no serious crime in this area only minor misdemeanours.Most local police administration has been computerised and has aided the local constable. He thinks that there will be a more positive move towards better community policing in the future. Local cases are heard in{Stevenage {Magistrates Court.}
